survey_name: Employee Feedback on AI-Powered Workplace Automation Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness, usability, and impact of AI-powered automation tools implemented in the workplace.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered automation tools in your daily work tasks?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the options cover the full spectrum of usage frequency.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered automation tools in your daily work tasks?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered automation tools do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Multiple times a day', 'Once a day', or 'A few times a week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes), with an optional text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered automation tools do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Multiple times a day', 'Once a day', or 'A few times a week' to Q1

questions.question_text: How has the implementation of AI-powered automation tools impacted your productivity?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Multiple times a day', 'Once a day', or 'A few times a week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for nuanced responses. Ensure the scale is balanced with a neutral midpoint.

script.question_text: How has the implementation of AI-powered automation tools impacted your productivity?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Multiple times a day', 'Once a day', or 'A few times a week' to Q1

questions.question_text: What challenges have you encountered while using AI-powered automation tools? (Open-ended)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Multiple times a day', 'Once a day', or 'A few times a week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Allow for detailed feedback. Use a text box with sufficient space for longer responses.

script.question_text: What challenges have you encountered while using AI-powered automation tools? (Open-ended)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Multiple times a day', 'Once a day', or 'A few times a week' to Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the training provided for using AI-powered automation tools?
questions.client_notes: Include a 'No training received' option to capture unmet needs. Use radio buttons for single selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the training provided for using AI-powered automation tools?

questions.question_text: What additional features or improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered automation tools currently in use? (Open-ended)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Multiple times a day', 'Once a day', or 'A few times a week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Encourage detailed suggestions. Ensure the text box is large enough for comprehensive feedback.

script.question_text: What additional features or improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered automation tools currently in use? (Open-ended)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Multiple times a day', 'Once a day', or 'A few times a week' to Q1
